survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Skateboards Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, usage patterns, and purchasing considerations for electric skateboards.

questions.question_text: Have you ever used an electric skateboard?
answer_options: Yes, but I no longer own one
No, but I am interested in trying one
No, and I am not interested
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: Have you ever used an electric skateboard?
answer_options: Yes, but I no longer own one
No, but I am interested in trying one
No, and I am not interested

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when considering purchasing an electric skateboard? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 response is 'Yes, I currently own one' or 'No, but I am interested in trying one'
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with a limit of 3 selections. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when considering purchasing an electric skateboard? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 response is 'Yes, I currently own one' or 'No, but I am interested in trying one'

questions.question_text: How much would you be willing to spend on an electric skateboard?
questions.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 response is 'Yes, I currently own one' or 'No, but I am interested in trying one'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format with clear price ranges.

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using an electric skateboard?
